title: Nuveen Intermediate Duration Municipal Term Fund (NID) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen Intermediate Duration Municipal Term Fund ( NID  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.043 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased NID prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 16th quarter that NID has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $13.58, the dividend yield is 3.8%.
The previous trading day's last sale of NID was $13.58, representing a -1.67% decrease from the 52 week high of $13.81 and a 13.26% increase over the 52 week low of $11.99.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the NID Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
